newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINNISH T-BILLS AUCTION RAISES FIM 1.59 BILLION.
newsitem.headline: FINNISH T-BILLS AUCTION RAISES FIM 1.59 BILLION.

text.p: The State Tresury Office's weekly auction of treasury bills (T-bills) on Tuesday raised 1,594 million markka, STO said.

It auctioned 204 million markka worth 190-day T-bills at an average weighted yield of 3.52 percent, 284-day paper for 390 million markka at 3.67 percent and 344-day paper for 1,000 million markka at 3.75 percent.
The auction brought the total outstanding amount of T-bills to 48.64 billion markka.
